attributes.action: Uphold the law which makes it illegal to handle stolen goods by destroying and not using the data which HM customs and revenue bought from the thief who stole the information from the bank in Liechtenstein.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HM revenue and customs has paid a thief £100,000 for data that he stole from a bank in Liechtenstein, this  should be an illegal act in itself.
Tax haven
See Sunday Times article February 24 2008 front page column two and continued on page 8.
